title: 210: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 10 (The Men Tell All + Tayshia Chooses Her Final 4!)
itunes:title: 210: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 10 (The Men Tell All + Tayshia Chooses Her Final 4!)
description:
The "Men Tell All” episode is here - but first The Broads chat some current tea (Bennett/Noah DM’s, Tayshia’s ex on Reality Steve, and Jess’ Hannah Ann theories and fears). Then they discuss Blake’s one-on-one, Tayshia’s discussion with Riley, and her Rose Ceremony that decides the Final 4. The “Men Tell All” recap then begins and they chat - Ed’s shade towards Chasen (who is NOT present), their love for Demar, the Bennett and Noah discussion, Yosef’s horrifying hot seat, Tayshia seeming sad, their new thoughts on Blake, Jason’s undying love for Clare, and so much more! 


***Join The Broads TOMORROW for their recap on the HOMETOWN episode!


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***MRS. FIELDS: Get 20% off site-wide with code CHATTY at mrsfields.com

***STAMPS.COM: Get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at Stamps.com, click on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and type in CHATTY

***CARE/OF:For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TakeCareOf.com/chatty50 and enter code chatty50

***EVERLYWELL: For 20% off an EverlyWell at-home lab test, visit everlywell.com/chatty and enter code chatty

***HAWTHORNE: Go to Hawthorne.co and use promo code CHATTY to get 10% off your first purchase!
